des: "I created this smoothie to keep me going in the morning and prepare for heavy workouts. It's high in good fat and antioxidants and will actually fill you up through the morning. It is also dairy-free."
ins: Blend almond milk, blackberries, blueberries, coconut butter, honey, and chia seeds in a NutriBullet(R) or blender until smooth and creamy.
